```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse','ggiraph','plotly', 'DT', 'patchwork', 'gganimate', 'readxl', 'gifski', 'gapminder')
for(p in packages){
   if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
     install.packages(p)
   }
   library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
```{r}

p <- ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot_interactive(
    aes(tooltip = ID),
    stackgroups = TRUE, 
    binwidth = 1, 
    method = "histodot") +
  scale_y_continuous(NULL, 
                     breaks = NULL)
girafe(
  ggobj = p,
  width_svg = 6,
  height_svg = 6*0.618
)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(binwidth=2.5, 
               dotsize = 0.5) +
  scale_y_continuous(NULL, 
                     breaks = NULL)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(data=exam_data,
```
